name: philly_cafes
description: Ground truth dataset for evaluating LLM prompting methods on cafe recommendation
source: Yelp Academic Dataset - Philadelphia Coffee & Tea, Cafes

restaurants.selection_criteria: Diverse features (DriveThru, CoatCheck, BYOB, price range, noise level, alcohol, etc.)

reviews.selection_criteria: Mix of recent and older reviews, diverse star ratings

requests.design_principle: Each request has exactly 1 correct answer
